text: Anticrates metreta is a moth of the Lacturidae family. It is known from Queensland, Australia. Adults have brown forewings, each with a white band outlined in orange across the middle and white patches at the base, tornus and apex. The hindwings are plain brown.lepidoptera.butterflyhouse Anticrates metreta's wingspan is around 2cms. ==References== Category:Zygaenoidea
title: Anticrates metreta
